article_title: Disability Insurance Awareness Month starts Monday
article_text:
The Plus Group Inc. will hold its second annual National DI Day event May 5.

Insurers, agents and brokers are getting ready to fight to bring attention to the need for income protection.

The disability insurance community will start Disability Insurance Awareness Month 2016 (DIAM) campaign Sunday.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Allison Bell
article_metadata.description: Anthem is throwing its considerable weight behind the campaign.
